reviews.review: This was a wonderful culmination of everything Marvel has been building up for the last ten years and I loved everything about it. Full of great action, amazing special effects, wonderful characters, and just an all out blast. I can't say anything else without giving it away, but I'll just say if you are a fan of the MCU then you owe it to yourself to see this movie.

The movie was fine. It was slow in a lot of points and the action was good when it was happening. The worst part about it is that’s it’s a part 1 in the worst sense: “to be continued...” like a TV show except next week is next year. Honestly, if it hadn’t been for Thor and Spidey, it would have been even worse. It wasn’t as good as AV1, Guardians 1, Ragnarok or Black Panther. It’s somewhere in the middle.
it was good made film and in my opinion actors did amazing performance

Superb culmination of the last then years of MCU that will leave you speechless at the very end.  The cast is superb, as usual, with each actor playing their characters at their usual best.  The standout is Josh Brolin as Thanos, who combined with some brilliant performance capture, crafts the MCU's best villain to date.  Even though his plan is monstrous (and based on the stupid overpopulation myth), you understand his motives and even feel for him at the lengths his is willing to go to accomplish his mission (which are horrifying).  Behind the camera, the Russos manage to balance the numerous characters and plot lines into an exciting epic, bouncing from New York to Wakanda to even outer space.  They match up the characters perfectly, from Iron Man & Dr. Strange to Rocket & Thor, giving the right level of heart between the epic action, which sets a new standard for blockbuster movies.  Simply put, the kind of movie that willl satisfy MCU fans and leave you clamoring for the next Avengers film.
Great movie, maybe best one yet, did a great job with a huge cast all getting spotlight and story. Might be hard to follow for a non hardcore fan.
Really good, although some problems as the iron man new reactor,
Much better than expected, a reallygood movie with the usual superhero movie problems.
Loved that the Guardians of the Galaxy characters played a major role in this film. They add an element of humor and entertainment that no other Avengers can match.

I'm a big Marvel fan and have watched all the Avenger's movies multiple times and enjoyed them, but the Avengers: Infinity War was not as good as the first two.  I won't say anything else because it would give away too much, but the  usual Marvel humor was lacking  as well! ??
Disappointing. Series is running out of steam.
